pages.text: tebarake-llezi biyedihi-lmulk. vehuve `ala kulli sey'in kadir
ellezi haleka-lmevte velhayate liyebluvekum eyyukum ahsenu `amela. vehuve-l`azizu-lgafur
ellezi haleka seb`a semavatin tibaka. ma tera fi halki-rrahmani min tefavut. ferci`i-lbesara hel tera min futur
summe-rci`i-lbesara kerrateyni yenkalib ileyke-lbesaru hasiev vehuve hasir
velekad zeyyenne-ssemae-ddunya bimesabiha vece`alnaha rucumel lisseyatini vea`tedna lehum `azabe-sse`ir
iza ulku fiha semi`u leha sehikav vehiye tefur
tekadu temeyyezu mine-lgayz. kullema ulkiye fiha fevcun seelehum hazenetuha elem ye'tikum nezir
kalu bela kad caena nezirun fekezzebna vekulna ma nezzele-llahu min sey'. in entum illa fi dalalin kebir
vekalu lev kunna nesme`u ev na`kilu ma kunna fi ashabi-sse`ir
inne-llezine yahsevne rabbehum bilgaybi lehum magfiratuv veecrun kebir
